pullrequest.title: Print cmake build warnings and errors to std_err

content.raw:
> It looks like colcon only prints the messages that are directed to std_err

This outputs stdout to console: `--event-handlers console_direct+`

You can also check the output under `log/latest/sdformat8/...`.

---

But in any case, I think this change is a good idea. I'd suggest changing from `STATUS` to `WARNING` / `SEND_ERROR` though.
content.html:
It looks like colcon only prints the messages that are directed to std_err

This outputs stdout to console: --event-handlers console_direct+

You can also check the output under log/latest/sdformat8/....

But in any case, I think this change is a good idea. I'd suggest changing from STATUS to WARNING / SEND_ERROR though.
